text.section:
In this section, "milk emergency":
Means a general and acute shortage of milk from Grade A dairy farms; and
Does not include a simple shortage of milk from Grade A dairy farms that affects only a small number of distributors.

section.section: In a milk emergency, the Secretary may authorize the sale of a pasteurized milk product that has not been certified as Grade A pasteurized milk.
A person who sells a milk product under this subsection shall label the milk product as the Secretary requires.
